description: A deep rich and satisfying premium stout with complex balanced flavours and a warm subtle chocolate finish.
name: Rudgate - York Chocolate Stout

description: Strong dark porter that combines the sweetness of plums with the hoppy flavour of a porter.
name: Titanic - Plum Porter

description: BlackIrisBreweryNeonRaptorMoshassurus
name: Black Iris Brewery x Neon Raptor - Moshassurus

description: An attractive mahogany, bringing forth flavours of honey and caramel with just a light bitterness in the finish to keep it balanced.
name: Thornbridge - Lord Marples

description: Rich and well balanced with a mellow malty flavour that gives way to a clean, refreshing finish
name: Brains - The Rev. James

description: Fruity, premium strength golden ale showcasing hops from around the world.
name: Abbeydale - Absolution

description: The drinkers' favourite, a classic ale with a complex citrus and hoppy aroma.
name: Timothy Taylor - Landlord

description: This contemporary IPA explodes with amazing hop harvest aromas, packs in big tropical and citrus hop flavours before a crisp, refreshing finish.
name: Oakham - Green Devil

description: Dry hopped with El Dorado and Ekuanot with Cascade hops thrown in at the bittering stage. Expect big tropical fruit flavours in this classic USA hopped IPA.
name: Black Iris - Let The Devil In

description: Cool, calm and collected - Citra and Chinook. Citrus, grapefruit and pine notes in this one.
name: Shiny - Ambient Souls

description: A classic pale ale, brewed from British pale malt and US Cascade hops.
name: Ossett - Excelsius

description: An extremely pleasant bitter, straw coloured beer with a terrific fresh, hoppy aroma.
name: Hopback - Summer Lightning

description: Our hop morphing Session IPA last brewed in early 2021 now hopped with a hop combination of Sabro, Citra, Simcoe, Mosaic.
name: Brew York – X Panda

description: Part of the Wanderlust series. A New World Pale Ale, based on hops from New Zealand and the USA. Tropical citrus aroma, slightly sweet on the palate.
name: Magpie - Roam

description: A juicy Pale Ale packed full of Amarillo at flameout. Double dry-hopped with yet more Amarillo and Motueka for a huge fruity citrusy aroma and lush notes of orange and mandarin on the palate.
name: Liquid Light - Day Tripper

description: Enticing tropical fruit aromas and a lovely thirst quenching bitterness.
name: Blue Monkey - BG Sips

description: An eminently drinkable pale session ale. Subtle malt and floral notes are matched splendidly with citrus hop, rounded off with a slightly dry finish
name: Ay Up - Dancing Duck

description: Rollin’ Home is our house session pale ale brewed with maximum flavor. The added late hop additions of Ahtanum & Citra really benefits soft citrus. , peppery tones with a spice finish. At 3.8% , don’t walk to the bar for another. Run to the bar.
name: Red Dog Ales - Rollin' Home

description: A cloudy cider that provides a crisp apple flavour with a refreshing fruit finish.
name: Westons Cider - Rosie's Pig

description: Ruby Tuesday has a gorgeous rich red raspberry blush and is bursting with the wonderful taste of this beautiful berry.
name: Celtic Marches - Ruby Tuesday

description: Lukas is straw blonde, full-bodied yet sparklingly light. This Helles exudes a subtle, freshly bakes bread maltiness, balanced with an elegant noble hop aroma.
name: Thornbridge - Lukas
